DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the present study is to determine the influence of position of soft tissue repair (flexion versus extension) in post operative range of motion(ROM) and functional outcome in patients who underwent primary total knee arthroplasty (TKA).
DOC.brief_title: Flexion Versus Extension Soft Tissue Repair in Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: were individuals with osteoarthritis indicated for primary Total Knee Arthroplasty previous fracture in thigh previous fracture in leg previous high tibial osteotomy
